revised_title: Anatomy and Structure of Heliopora Cærulea and Sarcophyton: A Study of Alcyonarian Corals
tldr: The author examines the structure and relations of the Alcyonarian Heliopora cærulea and a species of Sarcophyton, providing detailed descriptions of their anatomy and discussing their affinities to other coral genera. The study also includes notes on the structure of species from the genera Millepora and Pocillopora, as well as remarks on the affinities of certain Paleozoic Corals.
